argumentText:
ARGUMENT
d w x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-metuOLD | |- metUnifOLD = ( d e. U. ran *Met |-> ( ( dom dom d X. dom dom d ) filGen ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' d " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> metUnifOLD = ( d e. U. ran *Met |-> ( ( dom dom d X. dom dom d ) filGen ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' d " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> d = D ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> dom d = dom D ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> dom dom d = dom dom D ) |
| 6 |  | #P_xmetdmdm | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> X = dom dom D ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> X = dom dom D ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> dom dom d = X ) |
| 9 | 8, 8 | #P_xpeq12d | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> ( dom dom d X. dom dom d ) = ( X X. X ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simplr | |- ( ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) /\ a e. RR+ ) -> d = D ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_cnveqd | |- ( ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) /\ a e. RR+ ) -> `' d = `' D ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_imaeq1d | |- ( ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) /\ a e. RR+ ) -> ( `' d " ( 0 [,) a ) ) = ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_mpteq2dva | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' d " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) = ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_rneqd | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' d " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) = ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 9, 14 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> ( ( dom dom d X. dom dom d ) filGen ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' d " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) ) = ( ( X X. X ) filGen ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_elfvdm | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> X e. dom *Met ) |
| 17 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = X -> ( *Met ` x ) = ( *Met ` X ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( x = X -> ( D e. ( *Met ` x ) <-> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( X e. dom *Met /\ D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) -> E. x e. dom *Met D e. ( *Met ` x ) ) |
| 20 | 16, 19 | #P_mpancom | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> E. x e. dom *Met D e. ( *Met ` x ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_df-xmet | |- *Met = ( x e. _V |-> { d e. ( RR* ^m ( x X. x ) ) | A. y e. x A. z e. x ( ( ( y d z ) = 0 <-> y = z ) /\ A. w e. x ( y d z ) <_ ( ( w d y ) +e ( w d z ) ) ) } ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_funmpt2 | |- Fun *Met |
| 23 |  | #P_elunirn | |- ( Fun *Met -> ( D e. U. ran *Met <-> E. x e. dom *Met D e. ( *Met ` x ) ) ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( D e. U. ran *Met <-> E. x e. dom *Met D e. ( *Met ` x ) ) |
| 25 | 20, 24 | #P_sylibr | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> D e. U. ran *Met ) |
| 26 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( ( X X. X ) filGen ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) ) e. _V |
| 27 | 26 | #P_a1i | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( ( X X. X ) filGen ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) ) e. _V ) |
| 28 | 2, 15, 25, 27 | #P_fvmptd | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( metUnifOLD ` D ) = ( ( X X. X ) filGen ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) ) ) |
